{\large    Political Data Science\\
   Activity 6 }

**With your group, figure out how to do the following**

1. Write code that will print every third number in [1, 100]

2. Write code that will print the following pattern

1 

1 2

1 2 3

... up to 20

.. and then back down again

1 2 3

1 2

1


3. Flip a coin (sample "H" and "T") and print what you get until you get the same thing three times in a row.
